    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please close the HSBC HK App on your device completely (eg swipe up from the bottom of your screen and hold, then swipe up on the app's preview to close it). If you still see the 'Welcome to HSBC HK' page upon relaunch, please select 'Log on' and then 'Yes, logon' to set up the HSBC HK App. Should you have other enquiries, please contact us.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When you log on to HSBC HK App for the first time or using a new device, you will be asked to create a 6-digit 'Mobile Banking PIN' for this device to activate Mobile Security Key. Please refer to our <a href="/campaigns/prom203/#accordion-i-am-using-online-banking-but-new-to-app" target="_self">step-by-step-guide</a>.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For security reasons, you can only activate HSBC HK App on one device. You may remove linked devices on HSBC HK App or Online Banking to free up space for your new device.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll need your Security Device or Mobile Security Key to do it.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can change your transfer limit to a registered or unregistered payee in online banking.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">But if you just need to make a small-value payment of HKD10,000 or less, you can adjust the daily limit for it by going to 'Profile', selecting 'Pay and transfer' then 'Small-value payment limit' in the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. The maximum daily limit for small-value payments is HKD10,000.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may have already added this payee. You can check if that's the case in your 'My payees' list when you make a transfer.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Or you may have entered the wrong account number or FPS proxy ID (i.e. mobile number, email address or FPS Identifier). Please check the information before trying again.</p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_12" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can now update your mobile number and email address via the HSBC HK App by following these steps:<br> </p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to HSBC HK App.</li> 
 <li>Tap the profile icon in the top right-hand corner of your screen.</li> 
 <li>Swipe the name card or tap 'Contact details' under 'Settings and preferences' to enter the 'Contact details' page.</li> 
</ol> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Your mobile number and email address will be displayed on the 'Contact details' page. You can now update any of these fields by tapping the edit button next to them.</li> 
 <li>Please note that you can only update these fields if you have a valid mobile number and/or email address in our records. If you only have either one which is valid and wish to do the update the other, you can only add/update the missing/invalid detail with your HKID via HSBC HK App.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_16">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_13" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can now update your residential & correspondence address via the HSBC HK App by following these steps:</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>Log on to HSBC HK App</li>
 <li>Tap on the profile icon in the top right-hand corner of your screen</li>
 <li>Swipe the name card or tap on 'Contact details' under 'Settings an­d preferences' to go to the 'Contact details' page</li>
 <li>Select the ‘Edit’/ ‘Update’ button next to ‘Addresses’</li>
</ol>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Your residential and correspondence address will be displayed on the 'Addresses' page. You can now update any of these fields by tapping the 'Edit'/ 'Update' button.</li>
 <li>Please note that you can only update your residential and correspondence address if you have a valid mobile number and/or email address in our records. Kindly ensure your mobile number and/or email address are up-to-date before updating your residential and correspondence address.</li>
</ul>
</div></div>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-2114590482__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-2114590482__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How long does it take for my address update request to be processed? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-2114590482__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_17">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_17" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_14" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you submit your request during office hours, it will be processed on the same day and the record will be updated in your customer profile. If your request is submitted outside of office hours, it will be processed on the next working day. For correspondence address, the update may take up to 4 working days to be effective for eStatements/ eAdvices, and some products like cards and MPF. Please note the office hours:</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Monday to Friday, 9:00am to 7:55pm; and Saturday, from 9:00am to 5:25pm HKT, excluding Sundays and public holidays.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1187510490__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1187510490__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Will the change of my mobile number or email address apply to all my correspondence with the bank?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1187510490__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_18">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_18" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_15" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, the updated mobile number and email address would be applied to all your existing products such as cards, insurance, MPF except general insurance and ORSO.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To update your contact details for general insurance policies with AXA, please contact AXA directly. To update your contact details in ORSO, log on to online banking or submit the data change request by paper form to your employer.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_15" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="728080922__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="728080922__tab0" class="dropdown-text">My mobile number and/or email address currently in HSBC's systems are missing or marked as invalid. Can I still update my contact details through the app?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="728080922__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_19">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_19" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_16" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Due to security measures, you can update your contact details via HSBC HK App only if you have either/both a valid mobile number and/or a valid email address in our records. If only one of the details (either mobile number or email address) is valid and you wish to update  the other, you can only add/update the missing/invalid detail via HSBC HK App. Mobile number and email address are critical information to ensure that we keep you informed about the transactions on your account.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're an HKID holder and either your email address or mobile number is valid in our records,  you can update the missing/invalid one on HSBC HK App by following the steps below:<br> </p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to HSBC HK App.</li> 
 <li>Select the profile icon in the top right corner of your screen.</li> 
 <li>Find 'Settings and preferences' and select  'Contact details' or click on the name card on the top of the screen.</li> 
 <li>Find your mobile number and email address in 'Contact details' and select the 'Update' button next to them.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If  you're not an HKID holder and your current mobile number in our systems is valid, you can also add or update your email address via HSBC Online Banking (with security code generated from your HSBC HK App or security device).</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to HSBC Online Banking on a computer.</li> 
 <li>Select 'Update email address' in the 'Quick links' menu.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you can submit the completed <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/accounts/change-customer-info.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Change of Address and/or Customer Information Instruction Form (For Personal Customer)</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Change of Address and/or Customer Information Instruction Form (For Personal Customer)  This link will open in a new window</span></a> by mail or visit <a href="/branch-finder/" target="_self">our nearest branch</a> with an identification proof document to update your details with our staff.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="264975773__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="264975773__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How long does it take for my updated contact details to take effect in the bank's systems? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="264975773__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_20">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_20" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_17" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your mobile number and email address are updated instantly in your profile via the app. However, it can take up to 4 working days for your other accounts (such as cards, insurance, or MPF) to update. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Hence, you might receive your statements for these accounts at the old email address until we are able to complete the update across all systems.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_5">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="registration"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Digital registration
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_4" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_17" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-650555894__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-650555894__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I register for Personal Internet Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-650555894__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_21">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_21" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_18" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You only need to register once on the HSBC HK App to get access to HSBC Online and Mobile Banking. Please keep your valid mobile number and email address updated on your bank record.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can verify your identity using any of the following methods.</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><strong>Valid HKID/ passport (same as your bank record)</strong><br> - Applicable to holders of New Smart HKID (2018 version)* as well as <a href="#id-to-verify-my-identity">supported passports</a><br> - Applicable to customers aged 18 or above<br> - Not applicable to customers holding HSBC MPF or ORSO Defined Contribution Scheme accounts only</li>
 <li><strong>HSBC bank account number and related ATM PIN or Phone Banking PIN</strong></li>
 <li><strong>HSBC credit card number and related ATM PIN</strong></li>
 <li><strong>HSBC MPF or ORSO Defined Contribution Scheme account number and last 6 digits of mobile number</strong></li>
 <li><strong>HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card number and related ATM PIN</strong></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Once you've completed the registration, you can activate your Mobile Security Key, set up your 6-digit Mobile Banking PIN and enable biometric authentication. Start exploring a wide range of features and services on the HSBC HK App.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you don't have a suitable device to complete registration and set up the HSBC HK App, please visit the nearest HSBC Hong Kong branch for assistance.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>If you have questions, please call our Customer Services:</strong></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>HSBC Global Private Banking customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li>
 <li>HSBC Premier Elite customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li>
 <li>HSBC Premier customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3322" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3322</a></li>
 <li>Other customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3000" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3000</a></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">* Please make sure the HKID shows the complete date, month as well as date of birth.</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_18" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1896963026__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1896963026__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why do I need to wait after scanning my HKID / passport and capturing my selfie to verify my identity when registering for Personal Internet Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1896963026__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_22">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_22" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_19" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may need to wait after scanning your HKID / passport and capturing your selfie as we carry out checks to verify your identity. We'll complete your identity verification swiftly and you may log on to the HSBC HK App right away. We may need more time to verify your identity in edge cases, but we'll notify you of the result within 24 hours via SMS and email. Upon successful identity verification, you can relaunch the app to log on.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_19" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1475729461__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1475729461__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why did my identity verification with my HKID / passport fail when I tried to register for Personal Internet Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1475729461__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_23">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_23" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_20" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please make sure you are using an <a href="#id-to-verify-my-identity">eligible HKID / passport</a> and capturing clear images of your HKID/ passport and selfie for identity verification.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_20" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1695026045__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1695026045__tab0" class="dropdown-text">My Personal Internet Banking registration was rejected. What should I do? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1695026045__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_24">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_24" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_21" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please try again. If you're using your HKID/ passport (same as your bank record) to verify your identity, please make sure of the following.</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>You are using a New Smart HKID (2018 version)* or <a href="#id-to-verify-my-identity">supported passport</a>.</li>
 <li>You are aged 18 or above.</li>
 <li>You are not only holding an HSBC MPF or ORSO Defined Contribution Scheme account.</li>
 <li>The images you capture are clear and readable.</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're using your account details to verify your identity, please make sure you enter the correct account number and associated PIN or mobile number as well as the latest ID document details you provided when you opened your account.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">* Please make sure your HKID shows your complete date, month as well as date of birth.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_26" class="sm-12 clear-float">

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1236368497__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1236368497__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Will I be notified when a new eStatement or eAdvice is available?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1236368497__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_30">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_30" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_27" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We'll send you a push notification, email or text message when it's ready. Please keep your email address and mobile number up to date in our records so you'll receive them. You can update your contact details via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app or HSBC Online Banking. Instructions on how to update can be found on the <a href="/mobile/faq/#cp" target="_self">'Change contact details' page</a>. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We recommend checking your emails or online banking regularly to review your latest eStatements and eAdvice, so you'll know if you need to do anything about them. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1900427739__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1900427739__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What's the eStatements and eAdvice service? What are its benefits? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1900427739__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_31">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_31" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_28" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Our eStatements and eAdvice service lets you access your statements and advice in online and mobile banking. By signing up for it, you'll help to save the environment by using less paper while getting the information more quickly. Of course, you can still print eStatements and eAdvice for your own records or save them on your computer if you'd like.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It's free and simple to use. You can sign up for it in minutes, or if you just opened a new account, you'll be automatically registered for it. What's more, you can get statements and advice for your different accounts securely with just this one service. You can access them any time once they're ready even when you're on the go.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll be able to view and download eStatements # from the last 7 years (84 months) *, and eAdvice from the last 3 months.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><sup>#</sup> available in online banking only.<br> <br> <sup>*</sup> eStatements for integrated accounts, HKD Current and Savings accounts are retained for up to 84 months<br> <br> <sup>*</sup> Credit card eStatements will also be accumulated for up to 84 months. If you don't see one, you can ask for a paper statement and we'll waive the fee.<br> <br> <sup>*</sup> eStatements for other accounts (including investment and securities accounts) are retained for up to 24 months.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">As a gentle reminder, we'll send you a push notification, email or text message when your latest eStatement is ready.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    

</div>
</div></div>

<h3 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_1">
    General and eligibility
</h3>
</div>

    <div id="content_main_accordion_6" class="accordions-container sm-12">

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1419246099__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="1419246099__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How is this different from opening an account at an HSBC branch? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1419246099__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_32">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_32" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_29" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The HSBC HK Mobile Banking app lets you open your account in less than 5 minutes. There is no need to go to the branch and submit your ID card or any other documents. As soon as you're done with Personal Internet Banking registration, you'll be able to access your account using the app or online banking.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This seamless account opening experience is also available to international customers and passport holders! Simply download the app to submit your application in just 10 minutes.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1289108959__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="-1289108959__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Am I eligible to open an account with the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1289108959__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_33">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_33" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_30" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, if you meet ALL the following criteria:</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>Age between 18–64</li>
 <li>Hold a new version of HKID card issued in Nov 2018 or later (permanent or non-permanent resident) or be an overseas passport holder<sup><a href="#1"><span aria-hidden="true">1</span><span class="visuallyhidden">1 View footnote 1</span></a></sup> or be an exit-entry permit (EEP) holder</li>
 <li>Reside in one of the selected nations/regions<sup><a href="#2"><span aria-hidden="true">2</span><span class="visuallyhidden">2 View footnote 2</span></a></sup></li>
 <li>Do not hold any of the following accounts or products in HK:
  <ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
   <li>HSBC banking or Time Deposit Accounts</li>
   <li>HSBC Investment Accounts (e.g. account suffix 381 or 383)</li>
   <li>HSBC credit cards (including supplementary credit cards)</li>
  </ol></li>
</ol>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li><a id="1"></a>There are 15 passport types supported including: Australia, Belgium, India, Ireland, Italy, Jersey, Mexico, Philippines, Singapore, South Africa, Taiwan, United Kingdom, United States of America and Vietnam.</li>
 <li><a id="2"></a>It is available for selected jurisdictions only which include Mainland China (submission only, please activate account in Hong Kong), Hong Kong SAR, Australia, Macau, Singapore, the UK and US.</li>
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

        <section id="153558936__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_34">

        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_34" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_31" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, eligible customers can open an integrated account or upgrade from HSBC One to HSBC Premier account by logging on to HSBC HK Mobile Banking app.  Online Banking or by calling our customer service hotline at (852) 2233 3722 from 9:00am to 8:00pm, Monday to Friday; and 9:00am to 5:00pm on Saturday. You can also visit one of our branches to find out more about your account upgrade with our staff.</p>
</div></div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1957100223__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_35">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_35" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_32" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes. As long as you don't currently have any accounts or credit cards with us and you meet the other requirements, you can use the HSBC Mobile Banking app to open your account.<br> </p>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="473109697__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">First, you need to download the latest version of the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Keep your ID document handy to start the process, and be ready to take a selfie. If you are a US resident, we will ask you to provide further documentation and our staff will contact you for the next step.</p>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_37">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_34" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can open an HSBC Premier or HSBC One Account.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For Hong Kong residents holding a new version of HKID card issued in Nov 2018 or later only: Once you successfully open an HSBC Premier or HSBC One account,  you can immediately open an investment account or apply for a credit card via HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. For those who would like to open an investment account digitally, please have your address proof issued within past 3 months.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please visit our branch if you can’t complete your application online. You’ll need to bring your HKID or valid identify, and a valid proof of address.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>

            <h4 id="-640052438__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Will I receive an HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card and/ or HSBC UnionPay ATM Card after applying for the card(s) while opening my account via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app?  </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-640052438__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_38">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_35" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're located in Hong Kong, your HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card and/or HSBC UnionPay ATM Card will be sent to you by post within 4-6 working days (Monday to Friday only; excluding Saturday, Sunday and public holidays). Simply call the Interactive Voice Response (IVR) hotline on <a href="tel:852-3163-0633" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 3163 0633</a> after activating your HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card to set up your debit card PIN; the HSBC UnionPay ATM Card PIN will be sent by post separately.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're located abroad, the delivery time of your HSBC UnionPay ATM Card is expected to be longer. The HSBC UnionPay ATM Card PIN will be sent by post separately.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please wait until you receive your HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card and/or HSBC UnionPay ATM Card PIN, and use that to register for Personal Internet Banking.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you see an account number after the final step of the process, it means your account has been opened successfully. You will receive your HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card and/ or HSBC UnionPay ATM Card soon.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Additionally, we'll send a welcome SMS to your registered mobile number, followed by a welcome email to your registered email address within 3 working days (Monday to Friday only; excluding Saturday, Sunday and public holidays).</p>

Please wait patiently, our staff will contact you within 5 working days (Monday to Friday only; excluding Saturday, Sunday and public holidays) if we need more information from you.</p>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="512906959__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_48" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When you enable Touch ID in the HSBC HK App, any fingerprint stored on your device can be used to log on to the HSBC HK App. We recommend enabling Touch ID if your fingerprints are the only set stored on your device. You can always add or remove fingerprints in 'Settings' on your device.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your fingerprints will not be stored in the HSBC HK App or anywhere within HSBC records.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1410857701__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_53">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Touch ID is an easy alternative to entering your Mobile Banking PIN on an iOS device. You can log on and authorise transactions in the HSBC HK App with just your fingerprint.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can either enable Touch ID when you next log on after activating Mobile Security Key, or do it later with your Mobile Banking PIN by selecting the 'Profile' icon at the top right corner, and then select 'Security' (then select 'Manage security').</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Touch ID is available on supported iOS and iPadOS devices. You'll need to activate your Mobile Security Key in order to use Touch ID for the HSBC HK App.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're using an Android™ device, please refer to the 'Fingerprint ID' section.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Only fingerprints stored on your device can be used to log on to your Mobile Security Key activated HSBC HK App.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your fingerprints won't be stored in the HSBC HK App or kept in HSBC records. You can select the 'Profile' icon at the top right corner, and then select 'Security' (then select 'Manage security') and use your Mobile Security Key to enable or disable Touch ID any time.</p>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can disable Touch ID in by selecting the 'Profile' icon at the top right corner, and then select 'Security' (then select 'Manage security') after logging on to the HSBC HK App.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Face ID lets you log on and authorize transactions on the HSBC HK App in a simple, secure and quick way using the facial map stored on your iOS or iPadOS device. It's an easy alternative to entering Mobile Banking PIN.</p>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that the probability of a false match using Face ID can depend on circumstances like how much your twin or sibling looks like you, and if you've enabled 'Require Attention for Face ID' function on your device.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please read the Terms and Conditions carefully so you know what the risks and consequences are, before you enable Face ID.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're concerned, you may use Mobile Banking PIN to log on instead.</p>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_71">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_67" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Fingerprint ID is a easy alternative to entering your Mobile Banking PIN if you're on an Android™ device. You can log on and authorize transactions in the HSBC HK App with just your fingerprint.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can either enable Fingerprint ID after activating Mobile Security Key, or do it later with your Mobile Banking PIN by selecting the 'Profile' icon at the top right corner, and then select 'Security' (then select 'Manage security').</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can only log on to the HSBC HK App using Fingerprint ID on your Mobile Security Key-activated device. Only fingerprints stored on your device can be used to log on.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your fingerprints won't be stored in the HSBC HK App or kept in HSBC records. You can select the 'Profile' icon at the top right corner, and then select 'Security' (then select 'Manage security') and use your Mobile Security Key to enable or disable Fingerprint ID any time.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mobile Security Key is a digital version of your physical Security Device that is stored safely in your HSBC HK App. Just like a Security Device, it provides an extra layer of protection for your accounts and transactions. It can be used to generate unique one-time security codes that you can use to log on to mobile and online banking, and access a full range of banking services.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can also enable biometric authentication with Mobile Security Key. That way, you can log on to the HSBC HK App or generate a security code to log on to online banking more quickly and easily.</p>

        </div>
        <section id="1611393088__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_112">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_108" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mobile Security Key is designed to work with the HSBC HK App on supported operating systems and devices. It will replace your Security Device so you don't need to carry additional devices with you to access our full range of online banking services.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can also enjoy more security as Mobile Security Key can only be used on your chosen device.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="901611772__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="901611772__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I activate Mobile Security Key on more than 1 device? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No, your Mobile Security Key can only be activated on one device at a time. If you would like to switch your Mobile Security Key onto another device, please refer to our <a href="/campaigns/prom203/#manage-device" target="_self">step-by-step-guide</a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This is to prevent anyone else from generating a security code using your device.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It will also serve as an alternative way to log on when you can't use biometric authentication (e.g. when you're wearing a mask or gloves).</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can select 'Forgot your PIN?' on the log on page, and follow the on-screen instructions. Please refer to our <a href="/campaigns/prom203/#reset-mobile-banking-pin-password" target="_self">step-by-step-guide</a>.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can change it any time on the HSBC HK App.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may log on to HSBC HK App, go to 'Profile', > 'Security' > 'Manage security' > 'Change PIN'.</p>

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_117">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_113" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. You will not be able to log on to the HSBC HK App without Mobile Security Key.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can still log on to HSBC Online Banking using your Personal Internet Banking username and password. However, you will be required to verify and select whether to trust your browser if you're using it to log on to HSBC Online Banking for the first time. You will need to generate a security code from your physical Security Device or complete SMS verification during the first time you log on to HSBC Online Banking.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_114" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Simply follow these steps, which are also shown on the HSBC Online Banking log-on page. </p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Launch the HSBC HK App on your device with the Mobile Security Key activated.</li> 
 <li>Select ‘Generate Security code‘ from the bottom of the screen.</li> 
 <li>Select ‘Log on‘.</li> 
 <li>Enter your Mobile Banking PIN. Alternatively, you can use biometric authentication to do this if you‘ve enabled it.</li> 
 <li>Enter the security code in the field on the HSBC Online Banking log-on page.</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_115" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No, your Mobile Security Key is linked to your personal accounts once activated so only you can access your accounts on your Mobile Security Key-activated device. No one else can log on to their account with that device.<br> </p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. You are required to activate Mobile Security Key (by setting up a 'Mobile Banking PIN') to continue using HSBC HK App. Your physical Security Device will be deactivated once you activate Mobile Security Key. </p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Call us so we can suspend your online banking account immediately and prevent anyone else from accessing your accounts.<br> </p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've changed your SIM card, you don't need to do anything. Mobile Security Key is tied to your device, not your SIM card or mobile number.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've changed your mobile number, please update your contact details via HSBC Online Banking. You'll need your Security Device or Mobile Security Key to do this. Simply log on, then go to 'Change Personal Information and Address'.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, as long as you're able to receive text messages for the number in the country/region you're in. That's because we'll send an activation code to that number once you've successfully registered it in our records.<br> </p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can. The HSBC HK App follows accessibility standards so visually impaired customers can also activate and use Mobile Security Key. But if you're unsure, you can still use your Security Device which is designed for visually impaired customers.<br> </p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_121" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No, your Mobile Security Key is tied to your personal device. We highly recommend that you activate your Mobile Security Key on the device you use regularly.<br> </p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_122" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Only one personal account will be linked per device. Unless you re-activate the HSBC HK App (e.g. remove your personal account from the device), you may not log on to a second account with the same device.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

            <h3 id="-76346832__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How do I log on to the HSBC HK App if I switch the Mobile Security Key to another device where biometric authentication is unavailable? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-76346832__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_127">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_123" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If biometric authentication is not available on that device, you‘ll need to use other ways to log on, such as with your Mobile Banking PIN.</p>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="456889538__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_128">

        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_128" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_124" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your 'Mobile Banking PIN' should comprise of 6 digits arranged in a unique combination only known to you. Please remember the 'Mobile Banking PIN' and update it regularly to protect your bank account. If you have inputted the incorrect 'Mobile Banking PIN' for a few consecutive times, your Personal Internet Banking will be locked.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When setting up your Mobile Banking PIN, please avoid:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>the same number more than once in a row, e.g. 000</li> 
 <li>more than three ascending or descending digits, e.g. 1234</li> 
 <li>repeating patterns, e.g. 010101</li> 
 <li>your birthday or any other significant dates (e.g. anniversaries)</li> 
 <li>the same digits in your passcode used to unlock your mobile device</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

</div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_12">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="security"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Security tips
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_17" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_124" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1886310046__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1886310046__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I use an Android device. When I try to log on to the HSBC HK App, a message is shown 'Your device is at risk' and my access to the app has been suspended. What should I do? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1886310046__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_129">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_129" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_125" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We apologise for the inconvenience caused. We are introducing extra safety measure to the Android version of the HSBC HK App to further strengthen our efforts to protect you from potential fraud which is resulting from malware that can take over your Android device.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If we detect potential risks on your Android device based on the following two criteria, your access to the HSBC HK App might be suspended for your protection.</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Installed apps from sources other than your phone’s official app stores and;</li> 
 <li>Granted certain permissions for these apps, such as screen sharing or full control of your device via accessibility.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To restore access and continue to use our app as usual, you must turn off the accessibility permission for the listed apps (Go to device settings > Accessibility) or simply uninstall them.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The process of changing the accessibility settings may vary, depending on the device manufacturers and the operating systems.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you may use the search function within 'Settings', key in 'Accessibility' and carry out the search and it should direct you to the relevant section.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For the detailed guideline on how to turn off the accessibility settings, please visit the HSBC Website. (Banking > Cyber security and fraud hub).</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_125" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-751560846__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-751560846__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why will the listed apps with accessibility permission turned on put my device at risk? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-751560846__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_130">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_130" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_126" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We understand that accessibility services might be useful to some of our customers as it can enhance the user interface. However, it will also require granting extensive permissions to apps (for example, the ability to read the text on the screen or the ability to record characters typed using the keyboard).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In the wrong hands, this could be exploited to record confidential data (like your mobile banking log on credentials) leading to the potential compromise of your critical account information.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="756471253__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="756471253__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_131">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_131" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_127" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The official app stores include Google Play Store, Samsung Galaxy Store, Xiaomi Mi GetApps, Huawei AppGallery, Amazon Appstore, OPPO App Market, VIVO App Store, MeiZu App Store, OnePlus App Gallery, HONOR App Gallery.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_127" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1284513122__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1284513122__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I'm an Android device user, how can I protect myself from malware? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1284513122__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_132">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_132" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_128" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To avoid malicious software attacks, please be cautious and refrain from clicking on any suspicious links or downloading apps from untrusted or unverified channels.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Never grant full control of your device to any third party or share your screen unless you’re absolutely certain of the source’s trustworthiness. These links or apps may contain malware that can be harmful.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We strongly suggest that you turn off unnecessary accessibility permissions from your device settings, and/or uninstall all unnecessary apps. We encourage you to download apps from official app stores only.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_128" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="28726882__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="28726882__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Should I delete these untrusted apps? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="28726882__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_133">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_133" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_129" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To better protect you, we suggest that you turn off unnecessary accessibility permissions from your device settings and/or uninstall unnecessary  apps. We encourage you to download apps from official app stores only.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_129" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1185381181__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1185381181__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I have already turned off the accessibility permission for those potentially affected apps, why am I still seeing the alert page 'Your device is at risk'? What should I do? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1185381181__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_134">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_134" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_130" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please close the HSBC HK App and relaunch it. You will be able to restore access and continue using our app as usual if the listed apps' accessibility permissions have been turned off and/or if the listed apps have been uninstalled.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_130" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1020956140__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1020956140__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why is my app labelled as a potentially affected app when it is available through some website? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1020956140__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_135">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_135" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_131" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We detected that there are apps on your device that are from sources other than the major phone manufacturers’ app stores (e.g. some websites).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Whilst we are introducing extra safety measure to further strengthen our efforts to protect Android device users from potential fraud incidents resulting from malware, we encourage you to download apps from official app stores only.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We would also suggest that you turn off unnecessary accessibility permissions from your device settings, and/or uninstall the apps if not needed, to prevent malware from harming your phone.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_131" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1914944360__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1914944360__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Is the new measure only to protect Android device users from potential fraud incidents resulting from malware? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1914944360__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_136">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_136" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_132" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes. As one of the major banks in Hong Kong, HSBC is committed to protect our customers from potential frauds. The new safety measure to the Android version of the HSBC HK App is to further strengthen our efforts to protect you from malware that can take over your Android device, leading to potential fraud.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
