            <h3 id="-676128608__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I exit the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app just by closing it or switching off my device?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-676128608__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_137">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_137" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_133" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We highly recommend that you close the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app properly by going to 'Profile' and tapping 'Log off' at the bottom of the screen.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_133" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="verify-your-identity"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="502993004__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="502993004__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I received SMS and email or came across a page / message notifying me about suspicious activities detected in my account. What should I do?​ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="502993004__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_138">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_138" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_134" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">​To protect you and your account, you are required to verify your identity before carrying out high risk transactions if we've detected suspicious activities from your HSBC Mobile or Online Banking.​</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can verify your identity to restore full access to our digital banking services in the following ways：​</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to the HSBC HK App > Select the 'Profile' icon at the top right of the homepage > Under 'Settings and preferences', select 'Security' > 'Verify identity' > Tap on 'Send verification code' at the bottom of the page > Enter the one time verification code received; or​</li> 
 <li>Go to an HSBC/Hang Seng ATM in Hong Kong > Insert your ATM card and enter your ATM PIN > Select 'Other services' > Select 'Verify identity for full digital banking access' > Confirm; or​</li> 
 <li>Call us on (852) 8204 6317; or​</li> 
 <li>Go to a nearby HSBC branch for help</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_134" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-416463015__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-416463015__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why can't I access the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app when there's a blue light filter app on my device? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-416463015__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_139">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_139" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_135" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've installed and enabled a blue light filter app on your device, you won't be able to access the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. That's because such apps interfere with our security measures which are designed to protect your banking information.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please disable the blue light filter app on your device to access the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_135" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1984209822__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1984209822__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I can't access the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app anymore on my Mobile Security Key-activated device as it's jailbroken / rooted. What can I do?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1984209822__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_140">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_140" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_136" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You won't be able to use our app on a jailbroken / rooted device as it's less secure against fraudulent transactions.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may remove Mobile Security Key on the jailbroken / rooted device through HSBC Online Banking. Please refer to the <a href="/campaigns/prom203/#manage-device" target="_self">step-by-step guide</a>. </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Afterwards, you may activate Mobile Security Key on a new device and continue having full access to HSBC Digital Banking.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you may contact us at <a href="tel:+852-2233-3000" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3000</a>. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_136" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1272516789__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1272516789__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Here are some tips to keep your accounts secure when you log on to mobile banking on mobile phones and tablets. You can find even more tips for safer online and mobile banking on our website.  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1272516789__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_141">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_141" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_137" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Don't store your username and password on your devices.</li>
 <li>Install the latest anti-virus and anti-spyware software on your devices, and update them regularly.</li>
 <li>Avoid sharing your devices with others. Use only your own devices to log on.</li>
 <li>Don't leave your devices unattended after logging on to online or mobile banking. Always log off properly when your'e done.</li>
 <li>Wipe the data on your old devices before donating, reselling or recycling them.</li>
 <li>Review your transaction history in online banking if you lose a device. Call us on <a href="tel:+852-2233-3000" class="no-link" role="presentation">2233 3000</a> to report the loss and any suspicious transactions. You should also enable wiping access remotely.</li>
 <li>Put an automatic lock on your phone so it requires a password/passcode to prevent unauthorised access to your device.</li>
 <li>Use only trusted Wi-Fi networks or service providers, and enable security protection such as Wi-Fi Protected Access (WPA) if you can.</li>
 <li>Disable Bluetooth if you're not using it, or set your device to non-discoverable mode.</li>
 <li>Use the original default browser on the device rather than browsers downloaded from other sources.</li>
 <li>Don't use a jailbroken / rooted device to log on to your banking as it may have security loopholes.</li>
 <li>Don't install apps or keyboards from sources you can't trust on your device. Make sure you understand the permissions you're allowing the app before installing it.</li>
 <li>Install updates and patches for your device as soon as you can, including any app and operating system upgrades/updates. If you can, enable data encryption on your device.</li>
 <li>Always enter www.hsbc.com.hk directly into the browser or use the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app downloaded from official app stores to avoid fraudulent websites and apps.</li>
 <li>Look for our Extended Validation SSL Certificate (EV SSL Certificate). On a Safari browser, this appears as a padlock next to our bank name at the top of the page. Note: this may be hidden on some screens and will show up only when you're scrolling down the page.</li>
 <li>Don't enable any blue light filter apps to run when you're using the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app as they may interfere with our security measures which are designed to protect your banking information.</li>
 <li>Don't mirror your screen so that other people can see it too.</li>
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    

</div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

<h3 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_10">

</h3>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_18" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_137" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1032225277__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="1032225277__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How should I make use of the activity log? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1032225277__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_142">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_142" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_138" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The activity log will facilitate you to identify suspicious activities easier and earlier. You can review the designated activities through HSBC HK App > Profile > Activity Log.​</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

</div>
</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="478518391__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="478518391__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What activities are logged in activity log? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="478518391__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_143">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_143" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_139" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To help you monitor your account, we log your high risk transactions and log on activities completed on HSBC HK App, HSBC Online Banking, HSBC Reward+ and HSBC Easy Invest. These types of activities are usually associated with a high risk exposure. Examples include, but are not limited to:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Logging on to HSBC HK App, HSBC Online Banking, HSBC Reward+ and HSBC Easy Invest</li> 
 <li>Setting up the HSBC HK App on a new device</li> 
 <li>Resetting username, password or mobile banking PIN</li> 
 <li>Enabling biometric authentication</li> 
 <li>Updating contact details</li> 
 <li>Transfers to non-registered payees</li> 
 <li>Adding a new payee</li> 
 <li>Updating payment and transfer limits</li> 
 <li>Bill payments</li> 
 <li>Blocking and unblocking credit card</li> 
 <li>Blocking and unblocking debit card</li> 
 <li>Activating physical credit card</li> 
 <li>Activating physical debit card</li> 
 <li>Adding credit card to mobile wallet (ie Apple Pay and Google Pay)</li> 
 <li>Adding debit card to mobile wallet (ie Apple Pay and Google Pay)</li> 
 <li>Requesting to increase credit card credit limit</li> 
 <li>Updating credit card control and spending limit</li> 
 <li>Updating debit card control and spending limits</li> 
 <li>Setting up overseas ATM withdrawal limit</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_139" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="733891693__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="733891693__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I view the details of different types of activities and settings shown on activity log via HSBC Online and Mobile Banking or other channels? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="733891693__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_144">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_144" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_140" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your devices set up for HSBC HK App or view your biometric setting</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Profile icon > Security > Mange devices</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your contact details</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Profile icon > Contact details</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your transfers to non-registered payees; bill payments and mobile cash withdrawals</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Select concerned transfer / payment / mobile cash withdrawal 'From' account</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your payment and transfer limits</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC Online Banking > Pay & transfer > Settings > Daily payment and transfer limits</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your payees</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC Online Banking > Pay & transfer > Manage payees / payments > View / delete your payees</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your autoPay instructions</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Pay & Transfer > autoPay</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your Top up HSBC accounts via eDDA set up instructions</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Profile icon > Pay and transfer > Set up and manage instructions under 'Top up HSBC accounts via eDDA'</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your credit card credit limit</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Select the concerned credit card account</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your credit card control and spending limit</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Select the concerned credit card account > View more > Manage credit cards > Card control and spending limits</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View the block/unblock status of your credit cards</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Select the concerned credit card account > View more > Block or unblock credit card</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your credit or debit cards added to mobile wallets (ie Apple Pay and Google Pay)</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Go to your device's mobile wallet and check if the cards have been added</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your debit card control and spending limit</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Select any sub-account of the integrated account linked with principal debit card > Manage debit cards > Card control and spending limits </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View the block/unblock status of your debit cards</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Select any sub-account of the integrated account linked with principal debit card > Manage debit cards</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your Local ATM daily withdrawal limit from debit cards</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Select any sub-account of the integrated account linked with principal debit card > Manage debit cards > Set daily cash withdrawal limit > Set local limit</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>View your overseas ATM withdrawal limit</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK App > Profile icon > Pay and transfer > Overseas ATM withdrawal limit</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_141" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Simply log on to the HSBC HK App, select your credit card from the account list, tap 'Activate' and follow the on-screen instructions. You might be required to input your selected credit card's expiry date to complete activation.</p>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-361198557__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-361198557__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What types of credit cards can I activate via the HSBC HK App?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can make a payment by the following steps:<br> </p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Choose the credit card account you wish to pay.</li> 
 <li>Click ‘Make a payment’ at the top of the page and choose ‘Pay current amount due’ or ‘Pay total minimum payment amount’ or ‘Pay another amount’.</li> 
 <li>Select the account you wish to pay ‘From’</li> 
 <li>If you choose ‘Pay current amount due’ or ‘Pay total minimum payment amount’, the payment amount will be automatically filled. If you choose ‘Pay another amount’, you need to input the amount you wish to pay.</li> 
 <li>Complete the payment the way you would with a transfer.<br> </li>

            <div class="exp-panel">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_157">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_152" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It's an approved transaction which will be deducted from your available credit limit eventually. It won't be posted to your credit card account until the merchant has sent the transaction to us for settlement.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A pending transaction can also be a temporary hold on funds in your credit card account. Some merchants use this to ensure you have the available credit limit for items such as hotel or car rental deposits. Pending transactions, although will be deducted from your available credit limit, won't affect your account balance, and don't need to be settled until they have been posted.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can see pending transactions on all personal credit card accounts. If you're the primary cardholder, you'll be able to see your own pending transactions as well as those of supplementary accounts.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">But if you're the supplementary cardholder, you'll only be able to see your own pending transactions.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For transactions up to HKD500 where your physical card or digital wallet is not presented, you will receive credit card transaction notification via email by default. For transactions above HKD500 you will receive notification via SMS.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can change the notification channel preference to either email or SMS for transactions up to HKD500 by tapping the profile icon from home page and selecting 'Communication preferences', then 'Credit card transaction notifications' in your HSBC HK App.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Lost or stolen credit cards should be reported as soon as possible. You can report and request replacements via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app or HSBC Online Banking.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Learn how to <a href="/help/card-support/lost-or-stolen/" target="_self">report a lost or stolen card</a>.</p>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_166">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please follow these instructions:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log into the HSBC HK App</li> 
 <li>Select 'Support' on the bottom menu bar</li>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_167">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_162" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Lost and stolen credit card incidents should be reported as soon as possible. Prompt action will help prevent any potential fraudulent transactions on your lost/stolen credit cards.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can report lost or stolen credit card incidents that have occurred within the last 30 days via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking App or HSBC Online Banking.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To report incidents more than 30 days old, please call our Customer Service Hotline.</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>HSBC Global Private Banking customers: <a href="tel:852-2233-3033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li> 
 <li>HSBC Premier Elite customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li> 
 <li>HSBC Premier customers: <a href="tel:852-2233-3322" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3322</a></li> 
 <li>Other customers: <a href="tel:852-2233-3000" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3000</a></li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="536317320__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_168">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_168" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_163" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Lost/stolen credit card reports and replacement requests made via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app are processed instantly. We will immediately block your credit card to ensure it is no longer valid and send you an email/letter notification.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Replacement credit cards with a new number will be issued within 5 working days and sent to your registered correspondence address.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_169">

        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_169" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_164" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We recommend you wait until the transaction is processed and posted before disputing. Pending transactions are subject to change until the final transaction amount has been processed and posted. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">However, if you realise your credit card is lost or stolen, please report it immediately via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app or HSBC Online Banking.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please report other lost/stolen HSBC cards (eg. debit cards) via HSBC Online Banking or our Customer Service Hotline. </p>

        <section id="-1409532560__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_171">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">While a pending transaction is deducted from your available credit limit immediately, it isn't reflected from your account balance until the merchant sends us the settlement request and we process it fully.<br> </p>

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_179">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_174" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A Spending Instalment Plan lets you settle individual eligible transactions or your eligible card account balance (minimum HKD1,000) by instalment.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-672994941__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-672994941__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What are the eligibility requirements to apply for a Spending Instalment Plan?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-672994941__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_180">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_180" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_175" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The only requirement is that your card account must have at least HKD1,000 of eligible balance.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Primary cardholders can apply the balance or transactions made under Primary or Additional card via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app and other channels.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Additional cardholders can apply for a Spending Instalment Plan for their own balance or transactions via the HSBC hotline.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

    </div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1116219056__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1116219056__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why can't I apply for a Spending Instalment Plan on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1116219056__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_181">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_181" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_176" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You won't be able to apply for a Spending Instalment Plan if:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">your selected card type is ineligible</p> </li> 
 <li>your card account does not have at least HKD1,000 of eligible balance</li> 
 <li>you're an additional cardholder, rather than the primary cardholder</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The following cards are ineligible:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>USD Visa Gold Card</li> 
 <li>an undergraduate credit card</li> 
 <li>a private label card</li> 
 <li>RMB sub-account of a UnionPay Dual Currency Credit Card</li> 
 <li>RMB sub-account of a HSBC Pulse UnionPay Currency Diamond Card</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Additional cardholders can apply for a Spending Instalment Plan for their own balance or transactions via the HSBC hotline.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-371775377__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-371775377__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Which credit cards are eligible for Spending Instalment Plan? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-371775377__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_182">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_182" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_177" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You are eligible to apply for the Spending Instalment Plan only if you hold a personal credit card issued by us (whether a primary or an additional credit card).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The following cards are not eligible:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>USD Visa Gold Card</li> 
 <li>an undergraduate credit card</li> 
 <li>a private label card</li> 
 <li>RMB sub-account of a UnionPay Dual Currency credit card</li> 
 <li>RMB sub-account of a HSBC Pulse UnionPay Currency Diamond Card</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>

    </div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="347312859__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="347312859__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What kinds of transactions are eligible for the Spending Instalment Plan and when do I need to apply?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="347312859__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_183">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_183" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_178" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Spending Instalment Plan can only be applied to posted transactions billed on the current statement and posted unbilled transactions made with a card.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You must submit the application via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app or HSBC Reward+ app at least 1 working day before the payment due date of the relevant transaction.<br> <br> Ineligible transactions include but are not limited to:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>unposted, cancelled or refunded transactions</li> 
 <li>cash advances</li> 
 <li>instalment plan</li> 
 <li>Octopus AAVS (Octopus Automatic Add-Value Service)</li> 
 <li>withdrawal amount under a cash instalment plan and/or a cash credit plan</li> 
 <li>gambling transactions</li> 
 <li>purchase and/or reload of stored value cards or e-Wallets</li> 
 <li>transaction at non-financial institutions (including purchase of foreign currency, money orders and travellers cheques)</li> 
 <li>transactions at financial institutions (including purchase of merchandise and services from banks)</li> 
 <li>wire transfers</li> 
 <li>all fees and charges</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1245738255__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1245738255__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I apply for a Spending Instalment Plan on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1245738255__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_184">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_184" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_179" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can apply by:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Under 'Explore products and services', select 'Credit cards'. Then select 'Spending Instalment Plan'.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">OR</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select one of your HKD credit cards. Then select 'View more' and choose 'Create or view Spending Instalment Plan'.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_180" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">

<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>bank fees and charges</li> 
 <li>bank maintenance fees (such as card repayment, marketing rebate balance adjustment)</li> 
 <li>Octopus AAVS transactions</li> 
 <li>ATM transactions</li> 
 <li>interest-free Merchant Instalment Plan</li> 
 <li>bill payments</li> 
 <li>payment to settle credit card statement balance or purchases with RewardCash</li> 
 <li>credit card payments for redemptions on HSBC Reward+ eShop</li> 
 <li>payment returns</li> 
 <li>transactions related to Cash Credit Plan </li> 
 <li>reposted transactions</li> 
</ul>

<h3 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_12">
    Card transaction dispute
</h3>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_195" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-412571201__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="-412571201__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I raise a transaction dispute for my credit card via HSBC HK App? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-412571201__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_201">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_201" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_196" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can raise a transaction dispute by following these steps:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to HSBC HK App.<br> </li> 
 <li>Select your credit card account and tap on a transaction to view its details.<br> </li> 
 <li>Select 'Have a query on this transaction?' if you don't recognise the transaction or have any other queries.<br> </li> 
 <li>Select 'I don't recognise this transaction' then select 'Continue'.<br> </li> 
 <li>Answer a few questions to identify the reason for and circumstances of the dispute.<br> </li> 
 <li>Select 'Continue' to review your transaction dispute submission.<br> </li> 
 <li>Select 'Submit dispute' to cancel the card immediately and raise the dispute.<br>  </li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can order a replacement card immediately after raising the dispute by following these additional steps:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>On the dispute confirmation page, select 'Order replacement card'.<br> </li> 
 <li>Review the replacement summary and 'Accept' the important information.<br> </li> 
 <li>Select 'Confirm' to order a replacement card.</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="359438743__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="359438743__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I raise a transaction dispute for my debit card via HSBC HK App? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="359438743__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_202">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_202" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_197" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can raise a transaction dispute by following these steps:<br> </p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to HSBC HK App and go to 'Support' tab.<br> </li> 
 <li>Select 'Raise a debit card transaction dispute'.</li> 
 <li>Select a debit card to view transactions.</li> 
 <li>Select the transaction that you want to raise a dispute for.</li> 
 <li>Select 'I or my supplementary cardholder don't recognise this transaction'.</li> 
 <li>Read the notes about raising a dispute and then select 'Continue'.</li> 
 <li>Answer a few questions to identify the reason for and circumstances of the dispute.</li> 
 <li>Select 'Continue' to review your transaction dispute submission.</li> 
 <li>Select 'Submit dispute' to cancel the card immediately and raise the dispute.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can order a replacement card immediately after raising the dispute by following these additional steps:<br> </p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>On the dispute confirmation page select 'Order replacement card'.</li> 
 <li>Review the replacement summary and 'Accept' the important information.</li> 
 <li>Select 'Confirm' to order a replacement card.</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can raise a dispute on credit card transactions using your app, except for (but not limited to): </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Octopus Automatic Add Value Service (AAVS) auto-reload transactions.</li> 
 <li>Payments, bank fees & charges, credit refunds.</li> 
 <li>Instalment Transactions (Merchant Instalment Plan, Spending Instalment Plan, Cash Instalment Plan) and Cash Credit Plan.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Any transactions that can be disputed via the Mobile Banking app will show the "Have a query on this transaction?" button.</p>
</div></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_205">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. If you raise a transaction dispute, we'll automatically report your card as lost or counterfeit and it will be cancelled immediately.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll be able to order a replacement card after raising the dispute via the HSBC HK App. Otherwise, you can get in touch via 'Chat with us' or call our service hotline.</p>
</div></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_210">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_210" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_205" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Generally, we'll temporarily refund the dispute amount to you within 7 working days once we receive your dispute request, unless longer processing time is required.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We'll notify you when the temporary refund has been processed. The dispute will normally take 6 to 8 weeks for investigation with the merchant acquirer. We will contact you to follow up, if required.</p>

<h3 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_13">
    Credit Card Limit Transfer
</h3>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_22" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_206" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-2004961322__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="-2004961322__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is a Credit Card Limit Transfer? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-2004961322__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_212">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_212" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_207" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Credit Card Limit Transfer allows you to easily transfer your credit limit from one or multiple eligible credit cards to another eligible credit card under your name, without any supporting document. The new credit limit will be effective immediately. You can submit the request anytime, and submit it again when you need.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note: This service only applies to HKD primary credit cards.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please be reminded to consider the recurring payment or any upcoming needs to avoid potential over-limit situation.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_207" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-810408386__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-810408386__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_213">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_213" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_208" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can access Credit Card Limit Transfer via your HSBC HK Mobile Banking App and follow the below instructions:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to your HSBC HK Mobile Banking App <br> </li> 
 <li>Select one of your credit cards from the homepage <br> </li> 
 <li>Select "View more"</li> 
 <li>Select "Manage credit cards"</li> 
 <li>Select "Credit card limit transfer" under card services</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

            <h4 id="1342467501__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I transfer the credit limit if I have already submitted the Credit Limit Change request?  </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1342467501__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_214">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_214" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_209" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You cannot transfer the limit from and to the card for which you have already submitted the Credit Limit Change request, initiated by yourself (including credit limit increase or decrease).  However, you can still use other cards that are eligible for the Credit Card Limit Transfer and transfer the credit limit when you need.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note: If the bank initiates the credit limit increase/decrease for you, you can still access Credit Card Limit Transfer to submit the request.  However, the credit limit increase initiated by the bank will be cancelled upon the successful submission of Credit Card Limit Transfer.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There is no service fee for Credit Card Limit Transfer.</p>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_216">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_211" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can check the SMS & email upon successful submission of Credit Card Limit Transfer. You can find the full details of your original limit, transferred credit limit amount and new limit from the email record. </p>
</div></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_217">

    <div class="anchor" id="online-transaction-authentication"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Online Transaction Authentication
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_23" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_212" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1530941855__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1530941855__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why are you introducing HSBC HK App Online Transaction Authentication Service? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1530941855__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_218">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_218" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_213" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This is a robust new service which allows you to review and approve online payments safely and conveniently in the HSBC HK App, after successful log on.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_213" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1274516003__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1274516003__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why do I need a verification code/perform transaction authentication in HSBC HK App for online transactions? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1274516003__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_219">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_219" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_214" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Some online merchants use 3D Secure to improve the security of online purchases. When you make an online transaction using your HSBC credit or debit card you may be asked to approve the purchase using a verification code or give approval in the mobile app.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've already set up your HSBC HK App and have verified your identify, we’ll send an authentication request to the app so you can approve the payment safely with your 6-digit Mobile Banking PIN or biometric authentication (Touch ID/Face ID/fingerprint) on supported devices.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you’re not a registered user of the HSBC HK App a verification code will be sent via SMS to your registered mobile number. Simply enter the verification code in merchant’s payment page to authenticate your transaction.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_214" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-913473150__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-913473150__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Will I need to use a verification code or perform transaction authentication in HSBC HK App for all my online transactions? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-913473150__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_220">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_220" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_215" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No, you'll only need to do this when you make online transactions with merchants that support 3D Secure.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_215" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1546038049__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1546038049__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Do verification codes or transaction authentication requests sent to HSBC HK App expire? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1546038049__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_221">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_221" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_216" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, a verification code will expire 100 seconds after it's been issued. If the code expires before you use it, you can select 'Resend code' on the transaction page to get a new code sent to your registered mobile number and try again.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that verification codes can only be resent twice per transaction. If you ask for the code to be resent twice in a row without entering the correct verification code, you won't be able to complete the transaction. Instead, you'll be redirected back to the merchant's website to restart the transaction.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For HSBC HK App Online Transaction Authentication Service, the request will expire 3 minutes after it’s been sent for authentication. If the request expires, you’ll need to return to the merchant’s website and try again.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_216" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="604830514__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="604830514__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How do I authenticate an online payment through the HSBC HK App? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="604830514__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_222">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_222" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_217" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>After you've entered your card details on the merchant’s website/app supporting 3D Secure, we'll send you a push notification on your device to authenticate the transaction. Tap on the push notification and follow the instruction to approve the payment.</p>
<div class="commonMark-list">
<ul role="list">
<li>Check the transaction details and make sure they match your order.</li>
<li>Log on to your HSBC HK App and review the payment details. Select ‘Approve’ if you're happy to proceed.</li>
<li>If you don’t recognise the transaction or the payment details don’t match your order, select ‘Reject’ to decline the payment. You may temporarily block your card via ‘Didn’t recognise transaction?’ and report any suspicious transactions via ‘Chat with us’.</li>
<li>Once you’ve approved it in the HSBC HK App, return to the merchant’s website/app and follow the on-screen instructions to complete the payment.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="781425762__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="781425762__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I'm already logged on to the HSBC HK App and made an online transaction on a merchant's website/app. When I go back to the HSBC HK App I can't find any authentication request. How can I approve the transaction? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="781425762__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_223">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_223" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_218" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Online transaction authentication via the HSBC HK App needs to be completed within 3 minutes. If you’re already logged on to the HSBC HK App and have received a push notification on your device for the transaction, please tap on the push notification and follow the instruction to approve the payment. If you haven’t received a push notification, then please log off and log back on to approve the transaction.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

            <h3 id="-705545934__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I receive push notifications? I'd like to receive alerts for my online transactions that require authentication via the mobile app. </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-705545934__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_224">

        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_224" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_219" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>If you already have push notifications turned on, then you're all set to receive our fraud alerts. Otherwise, please follow these instructions to turn on push notifications in the HSBC HK App:</p>
<p>Step 1: Log on to the HSBC HK App</p>
<p>Step 2: Tap the bell icon on the top right</p>
<p>Step 3: Select 'Confirm’ to turn on push notifications</p>
<p>Follow the rest of the instructions on the app to fully set up your preferences. To understand more about our Push Notification Service Alerts, you can check out our <a href="/mobile/faq/#noti" target="_self" rel="noopener noreferrer">FAQs</a>.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your transaction might have timed out. Please resubmit your payment on the merchant’s website/app, then tap on the push notification and authenticate the transaction on the HSBC HK App. You need to do this within 3 minutes from the time that the transaction is initiated.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When you tap on a push notification and authenticate the transaction on the HSBC HK App, you’ll see a 'Next transaction' button to proceed to the next valid transaction.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>HSBC HK App Online Transaction Authentication Service is a secure new service which allows you to review and approve online payments safely and conveniently on the HSBC HK App, after successful log on. To change your preference for online transaction authentication, please call our customer service hotline.</p>
<p>HSBC Global Private Banking customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="no-link" role="presentation"><span aria-hidden="true">(852) 2233 3033</span><span class="visuallyhidden">(852) 2233 3033  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>
<p>HSBC Premier Elite customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="no-link" role="presentation"><span aria-hidden="true">(852) 2233 3033</span><span class="visuallyhidden">(852) 2233 3033  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>
<p>HSBC Premier customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3322" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="no-link" role="presentation"><span aria-hidden="true">(852) 2233 3322</span><span class="visuallyhidden">(852) 2233 3322  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>
<p>Other personal banking customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3000" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="no-link" role="presentation"><span aria-hidden="true">(852) 2233 3000</span><span class="visuallyhidden">(852) 2233 3000  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To keep improving, we need to regularly maintain and update our banking services.  During these periods, selected services including the HSBC HK App may be unavailable. So we don’t affect your card usage, a verification code will be sent to your registered mobile number instead for transaction authentication.</p>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_15">

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Cash Instalment Plan
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_24" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_223" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1159557144__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1159557144__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I get a Cash Instalment Plan with greater amount? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1159557144__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_229">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_229" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_224" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have more than 1 HSBC credit cards which are eligible for credit limit transfer, you can transfer the unused limit of one card to another card before you apply for the Cash Instalment Plan with the latter card.  You should:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to your HSBC HK Mobile Banking App and select the HSBC credit card you wish to apply for a Cash Instalment Plan with</li> 
 <li>Select "view more" and then "create or view Cash Instalment Plan"</li> 
 <li>In the prompt "Get more cash" on the onboarding or application for the Cash Instalment Plan please select "Transfer" this will re-direct you to the Credit Limit Transfer application process.</li> 
 <li>Complete the "Transfer Credit Limit" journey and select "Return to Cash Instalment Plan"</li> 
 <li>You will see your 'amount available for a Cash Instalment Plan' has been updated to reflect your credit limit transfer</li> 
 <li>Proceed with the remaining "Cash Instalment Plan" application process.</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_224" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-903131292__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-903131292__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What are the eligibility requirements to use Credit Limit Transfer with a Cash Instalment Plan? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-903131292__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_230">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_230" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_225" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You need to hold at least 2 valid Primary HSBC Hong Kong Credit Cards, which at least one that meets the Cash Instalment Plan requirements and the other that meets the requirements for Credit Limit Transfer.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-370389047__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_231">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_231" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_226" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you would like to do so, credit limit transfer has to be applied  before or during the Cash Instalment Plan application journey.  You may also transfer the credit limit after completion of Cash Instalment Plan application separately if you just want extra credit limit on the specific card for spending in future.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

</div>
