            <h3 id="2018967016__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I complete the credit limit transfer before applying for a Cash Instalment Plan? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2018967016__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_232">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_232" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_227" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The credit limit transfer will be effective immediately upon approval and the amount of your 'available for a Cash Instalment Plan' will be adjusted accordingly on your Cash Instalment Plan application journey.</p>
</div></div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-307119111__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-307119111__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Am I eligible for the Cash Instalment Plan? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-307119111__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_233">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_233" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_228" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To be eligible for a Cash Instalment Plan, you must meet these 2 requirements:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>have at least HKD2,000 of available credit limit</li> 
 <li>hold an eligible credit card</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please refer to the '<a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/credit-cards/cash-instalment-plan/terms-and-conditions.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Terms and conditions</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Terms and conditions  This link will open in a new window</span></a>' and the '<a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/credit-cards/cash-instalment-plan/key-facts-statement.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Key fact statement</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Key fact statement  This link will open in a new window</span></a>' for a list of ineligible cards.</p>
</div></div>

</div>
</div>

    </div>

</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can convert your credit into cash and transfer to either HSBC bank accounts, or non-HSBC bank accounts or credit card accounts. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC bank accounts:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Applications for transfers to HSBC bank accounts are instantly processed during system hours.</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>If income proof is not required, fund disbursement is instantly approved</li> 
 <li>If income proof is required, we are typically able to instantly review and approve your application upon receiving your supporting documents </li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Non-HSBC bank/credit card accounts:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For transfers to a non-HSBC account, you'll need to provide the bank/credit card account statement with the account number and your name. Once we receive your supporting documents, it takes at least 3 working days for us to process your application. Fund disbursement will also be subject to the other bank's processing time.</p>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Virtual credit card
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_25" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_240" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="668457216__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="668457216__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is a virtual credit card?  </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="668457216__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_246">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_246" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_241" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Virtual credit card is not a separate card. It allows you to view the same credit card information found on the physical credit card, including card number, your name on the card, card expiry date and CVV. You can also bind your virtual credit cards to your digital wallet for faster mobile payments.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">New cardholders can get their full card information via the HSBC HK App to make online purchases, without needing to wait for the physical card.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Existing cardholders can also find their card information in the app to make online purchases anytime, anywhere, even without the physical card on hand.</p>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Newly approved cardholders who applied for their cards online can activate their approved virtual card before receiving their physical cards in the mail. However, you will still need to activate your physical credit card.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Existing cardholders who have already activated their physical cards can automatically enjoy virtual card services (including viewing card information such as the expiry date and CVV) via the HSBC HK App.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It is mandatory to activate your physical card.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've activated your virtual card first, then you must activate your physical card within 14 days. Otherwise, the total credit limit will be capped at HKD10,000 or the approved credit limit (whichever is lower), and both virtual credit card and the physical credit card will be suspended after the 14-day grace period.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've activated your physical card first, then you will automatically be able to access your virtual card and add it to your digital wallets via the HSBC HK App.</p>

    <div class="anchor" id="esg"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            ESG Investment
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>

</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_26" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_247" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="358030561__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="358030561__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What does 'ESG' stand for? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="358030561__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_254">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_254" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_248" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG stands for Environmental, Social and Governance. <br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_248" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-166318061__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-166318061__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is ESG investing? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-166318061__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_255">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_255" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_249" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG investing, also referred to as sustainable investing, refers to specific investment approaches that aim to generate long-term financial returns while advancing sustainable solutions and outcomes. <br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_249" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-2047960264__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-2047960264__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why does investing in ESGs matter? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-2047960264__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_256">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_256" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_250" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG stands for environmental, social and corporate governance. It provides a measure which investors can use to seek and screen the sustainability of investment opportunities arising from the global response to climate change.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In October 2021, the 26<sup>th</sup> United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP26) reviewed and reinforced the progress of the 2016 Paris Agreement. With a goal of reaching net zero emissions by 2050, ESG investments are expected to become the main trend and experience long-term growth.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The future requirements for ESGs will increase and have a more important impact on corporate performances based on market demand. Investment portfolios may become more resilient and contribute to society as a whole through the inclusion of ESGs. Investors should also note that ESG solutions do not guarantee returns on their portfolios.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_250" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-274522037__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-274522037__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Does ESG investment provide or guarantee better performance? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-274522037__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_257">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_257" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_251" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">ESG investment maintains a focus on financial returns, alongside environmental and social considerations. Based on our analysis, adopting an ESG approach in investment has benefited stock and bond portfolio performance over the last 10 years. Also, risk-adjusted returns in the long-term are likely to be structurally stronger as the economy transitions to sustainability. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">However, ESG investment does not guarantee or necessarily provide better performance than their peers. ESG factors don't necessarily hurt investment performance, and sustainable investment may in fact help future-proof investment portfolios against the risks associated with a transition to a more sustainable economy.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note past performance does not indicate future returns.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_258">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We offer a comprehensive range of ESG and sustainable investing products that help align your sustainability objectives with your financial goals.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_253" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_264" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">After you place an order, the order status will be ‘Pending Dealing’ (during business hours) or ‘Pending Capture’ (after business hours). The possible order statuses include:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Fully Executed: all order quantity is executed upon the order expiry date.</li> 
 <li>Partially Executed: part of the order quantity is executed upon the order expiry date.</li> 
 <li>Unexecuted: order cannot be executed upon the order expiry date.</li> 
 <li>Fully Cancelled: request of order cancellation is accepted by broker (without partial executions).</li> 
 <li>Partially Cancelled: request of order cancellation is partially accepted by broker (with partial executions).</li> 
 <li>Pending Amendment: pending broker's acceptance of the request for order amendment, no further amendment/cancellation is allowed.</li> 
 <li>Pending Cancellation: pending broker's acceptance of the request for order cancellation, no further amendment/cancellation is allowed.</li> 
 <li>Pending Dealing: pending order execution.</li> 
 <li>Pending Capture: order received after business hours and pending validity checking. For orders with "pending capture" status, customers must check whether such orders have been successfully captured by the Bank with a "pending dealing" status or rejected due to insufficient funds or other reasons before market open on the next business day.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please click the links below for the product factsheets.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/investments/stocks/top-trader-club/local-securities-product-fact-sheet.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">HK Stocks</span><span class="visuallyhidden">HK Stocks  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/investments/stocks/top-trader-club/us-stocks-product-fact-sheet.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">US Stocks</span><span class="visuallyhidden">US Stocks  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1145033119__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1145033119__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Will my U.S. instructions be executed in alternative trading venues?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1145033119__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_276">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_276" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_270" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In respect of orders for securities listed on stock exchanges outside of Hong Kong, it is our existing practices that the Bank may transmit your orders to affiliated HSBC entities and third party brokers for execution, who may, subject to local regulation, execute such orders on alternative trading venues (“ATVs”), including dark pools.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The primary potential benefits for using ATVs is to achieve better pricing and to reduce transaction costs. In general, ATVs and ATV operators are subject to regulations which are not necessarily the same as regulations that are applicable to exchanges and exchange operators. A typical feature of ATVs is that there is no pre-trade transparency. The reference prices on an ATV could be “stale” or out-of-date due to latency from data feeds. Separately, access to ATVs is usually restricted and there could be less supply and/or demand on an ATV (as compared to the supply and/or demand on an exchange) due to the limited number of participants.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Our affiliated HSBC entities and third party brokers generally consider the execution price and opportunities for price improvement when deciding the appropriate venue for executing orders. There may also be other factors in their consideration, for example (i) market depth and order size; (ii) the trading characteristics of the security; (iii) speed and accuracy of executions; (iv) the availability of efficient and reliable order handling systems; (v) liquidity and automatic execution guarantees; (vi) service levels; (vii) the cost of executing orders; and (viii) execution certainty. The Bank will continue to monitor and evaluate the execution practices of our affiliated HSBC entities and third party brokers.  <br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>

    </div>

</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Currently, the HSBC Investment section consists of 4 types of holdings, including securities, unit trusts, bonds and ELIs. We are now adding two more products namely Capital Protected Investment (CPI) CPI and Deposit Plus (DPS). All of your settled position will be shown under the Investment tab, except in case of CPI and DPS which shall show the nominal value.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please be reminded that the securities holding in the HSBC Easy Invest app is now showing the executed position, which means this is reflected after the transaction is completed. The securities holding in Investment tab is reflecting the settled position.</p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_279" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC HK customers with an investment account can enjoy the Stock-related Smart Alerts and IPO Alerts via HSBC HK Easy Invest app (Easy Invest) for free and stay on top of stock market movements.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For Smart Alerts, we will alert you when important events happen to markets and the stocks that you care about - for example when there are significant price movements in your holdings, breaking news or order status updates. You can also set up free real-time Predefined Price Alerts and receive push notifications via Easy Invest at self-defined frequency whenever the price moves by a certain amount or percentage or when stock prices hit specified targets.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For IPO Alerts, we will alert you via push notifications when a company is open for subscription.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Download Easy Invest now for full experience and more details. Terms and conditions apply.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Real-time Predefined Price Alerts are triggered based on real-time stock prices or indices.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You will also receive notification when there are important events happen to markets and the stocks you care about, such as a new executive member appointment or the release of financial results or when your orders are executed, cancelled or partially executed.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">All the alerts will be sent via push notification in HSBC HK Easy Invest app.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll need your Security Device or Mobile Security Key to do it.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can change your transfer limit to a registered or unregistered payee in online banking.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">But if you just need to make a small-value payment of HKD10,000 or less, you can adjust the daily limit for it by going to 'Profile', selecting 'Pay and transfer' then 'Small-value payment limit' in the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. The maximum daily limit for small-value payments is HKD10,000.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Apart from viewing and deleting your registered payees via HSBC Online Banking, you can now manage your payees also via HSBC HK App. From 6 November 2024, you can:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>view and search all your registered local and global payees;</li>
 <li>add multiple accounts under a registered payee;</li>

</ul>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that if your bill is higher than your maximum amount, the autoPay instruction will be rejected and the payment will not go through.</p>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">'Recurring payment' is for payments that will happen on a regular basis, such as a monthly bill.</p>

<h3 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_18">
    Local transfers and bill payments
</h3>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-889300951__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="-889300951__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How do I make a transfer to registered local payees? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-889300951__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_308">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_308" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_301" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(a) You can use the ‘Recent local payees’ widget to view a list of 8 registered local payees that you've recently transferred to. Here's how:</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>Go to 'Pay & Transfer' tab.</li>
 <li>Select a payee record under 'Recent local payees'.</li>
 <li>Select one specific account if there are HSBC integrated account or multiple accounts registered under that single payee nickname.</li>
 <li>Select your debit account under the 'From' list.</li>
 <li>Enter the transfer details.</li>
</ol>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(b) Alternatively, you can transfer using the process below:</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>Go to 'Pay & Transfer' tab.</li>
 <li>Select 'Other local payees / FPS'.</li>
 <li>Select your debit account under the 'From' list.</li>
 <li>Select one specific account from 'All payees'.</li>
 <li>Enter the transfer details.</li>
</ol>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">(c) Or, you can initiate transfer through 'View all payees':</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>Go to 'Pay & Transfer' tab.</li>
 <li>Select 'View all payees'.</li>
 <li>Select a registered payee account.</li>
 <li>Select 'Make a transfer'.</li>
 <li>Choose your debit account under the 'From' list.</li>
 <li>Enter the transfer details.</li>
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Go to 'Pay & Transfer' page, and you'll see up to 8 latest registered local payee records that you've made transfers to recently in the 'Recent local payees' widget. With the record of recent payees displayed in the widget, you can enjoy a hassle-free local transfers experience.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Once you've transferred to a registered local payee successfully, the records under 'Recent local payees' widget will be refreshed. The most recent payee will be displayed on the extreme left of the list under 'Recent local payees' immediately.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">FPS (Faster Payment System) allows you to make instant payments 24/7 to individuals and merchants in HKD and RMB for free. You can also pay overseas merchants instantly. You can learn more about FPS <a href="/campaigns/fps/">here</a>.<br> </p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may have already added this payee. You can check if that's the case in your 'My payees' list when you make a transfer.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Or you may have entered the wrong account number or FPS proxy ID (i.e. mobile number, email address or FPS Identifier). Please check the information before trying again.</p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_306" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Select 'Pay & transfer', then 'Bill payments'.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To pay a new bill:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select 'Pay a new merchant'.</li> 
 <li>Choose a merchant and select a bill type (if applicable).</li> 
 <li>Enter the 'Bill payee account number'. </li> 
 <li>Choose 'From account' and input payment details to proceed.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To pay a merchant you've paid before:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select the merchant from your merchant list.</li> 
 <li>Choose the bill type (if applicable).</li> 
 <li>Enter the 'Bill payee account number'.</li> 
 <li>Choose 'From account' and input payment details to proceed.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To pay bills via FPS, find 'FPS' in the menu and select 'Make a transfer', or choose 'Pay with FPS' from the log on screen to scan the QR code.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can make your tax payment via the app by following these steps.</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select 'Pay & Transfer', then 'Tax payments'.</li> 
 <li>Choose 'From account'. Input your shroff account number as 'Bill account number'. Please omit the hyphen and English letters.</li> 
 <li>Input the payment amount to proceed and select the 'Payment date'. You can select the payment date from the calendar if you would like to pay in a future date.</li> 
 <li>Select 'Continue' and review your payment information.</li> 
 <li>Choose 'Confirm' to submit your payment.</li> 
</ol>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The amount shown is the maximum daily limit for that specific merchant category you can pay. If you have already paid bills to other merchants in the same category within the same day, you can only pay the current bill with the remaining daily limit. Please note that the limit will not be refreshed immediately based on the completed payments.<br> </p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can easily do so via the HSBC HK App. Please make sure you have your Mobile Security Key, 6-digit PIN or Security Device on hand.</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>Log on the HSBC HK App, go to 'Pay & Transfer' tab and select 'Other local payees / FPS'.</li>
 <li>Choose the debit account from your account list.</li>
 <li>Choose an existing payee from the list displayed or tap 'Pay someone new' to pay a new payee, then select one of the 5 methods (Account number, Mobile number, FPS ID, Email address, or Credit card).</li>
</ol>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To add a new payee into 'My payees', simply tick the 'Add to payee list' box before you proceed with the transfer.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll be able to manage the transfer limits of accounts under 'My payees' via HSBC Online Banking. You can also edit the payees' nicknames or delete the registered payees via HSBC HK App and HSBC Online Banking.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Transfer instructions are processed between 8.15am and 5.55pm, Monday to Friday, and 8.15am to 11.55am on Saturday, excluding Hong Kong public holidays.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can send transfer instructions whenever you like but requests received outside the times listed above are processed on the next business day.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Applications for same day value are subject to cut-off times related to the time zone of the destination and/or the requirements of the settlement banks. This means that your account may be debited before the value day. We are not liable for any interest expense or loss incurred as a result.</p>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can send us transfer instructions whenever you like but requests received outside these times are processed on the next business day.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Processing of outward telegraphic transfer instructions in Renminbi is subject to the schedule of the Renminbi clearing bank. For example, they will not process payments during holidays in mainland China, such as Labour Day and National Day.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Making Hong Kong dollar / Renminbi transfers to most of the banks in Hong Kong is free*.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For transfers to some Hong Kong banks, or overseas fund transfers, fees and charges may differ depending on the payment details (such as destination country/region, transaction currency and amount etc), please visit <a href="/fees/" target="_self">http://www.hsbc.com.hk/fees/</a> and download the Bank Tariff guide to see current Fees & Charges under section C2 for details.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that payees banks and any other banks used to send the transfer (both local and overseas) may impose additional charges, you can contact them directly about their fees.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">* There is no charge from us if you pay money to, or receive money from accounts of other banks via FPS, but other banks may have different charging policies.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In order to protect you during payment transfer, the instruction to add a new payee will come into effect after 6 hours. You can make only one transfer to each new payee before it is active. Transfers will be processed (and the corresponding daily transfer limit will be consumed) after payee becomes active. There will be email and SMS notification to confirm you once the transfer is done. </p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC Global Money Transfers is a mobile-exclusive experience that allows you to make international payments to overseas accounts on the HSBC HK App. You can now enjoy a faster payment experience and save on overseas bank charges incurred by telegraphic transfer.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">See the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/transfer-payments/international/global-money-transfer/gdlv-country-list.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">criteria for making Global Money Transfers</span><span class="visuallyhidden">criteria for making Global Money Transfers  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can use Global Money Transfers as long as you hold a HSBC integrated or current or saving account and use HSBC HK App.</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=hk.com.hsbc.hsbchkmobilebanking&hl=en_IN&gl=US" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Download the HSBC HK App</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Download the HSBC HK App  This link will open in a new window</span></a></li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Haven't used mobile banking before? No problem, you can sign up using the app.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Follow the on-screen instructions to set up mobile banking and your PIN all at once. Once you're set up, you can start using Global Money Transfers.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Currently, we don’t support future dated and recurring Global Money Transfers.</p>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="326382207__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="326382207__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I cancel or amend a Global Money Transfer payment? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="326382207__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_335">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_335" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_328" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can't cancel or amend a Global Money Transfer payment that has already been made. You must contact the bank or your relationship manager for assistance. Once we receive your request, we will send out the recall request on your behalf, but we can't guarantee the success of the recall, as it depends on the beneficiary bank.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_328" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-305493996__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="-305493996__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Do I need to pay a fee when making a transfer to an overseas account with telegraphic transfer? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-305493996__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_336">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_336" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_329" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A local service charge will be applied to all global payments via outward telegraphic transfer. This fee is waived for HSBC Global Private Banking, HSBC Premier Elite and HSBC Premier customers doing transfers via HSBC Online Banking and HSBC HK Mobile Banking App to their own HSBC accounts overseas (including joint accounts).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you request for any overseas handling charges to be paid by yourself rather than by the payee, an overseas service charge will be deducted from your account separately at a later date, once the charge has been charged back by the overseas banks. This can include charges levied by the payee's bank and any other banks used to send the transfer.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We'll tell the overseas banks how you prefer to pay overseas charges. The final charge settlement will be subject to the practice adopted by the overseas banks.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="/fees/" target="_self">See the latest Fees & Charges</a></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_329" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="625096828__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="625096828__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is the exchange rate for global payments after cut off times?  </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="625096828__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_337">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_337" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_330" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can quote the exchange rate at anytime. The exchange rate indicated by the bank only applies to immediate transfers. The exchange rates executed for future-dated transfers or transfers after cut off times (Monday to Friday 8:15am - 5:55pm, Saturday 8:15am - 11:55am, excluding public holidays) will be based on the exchange rate indicated by the bank on the day the instruction is effected.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're quoting an exchange rate outside of the normal trading hours (Monday 7:00am HKT to Saturday 4:15am HKT during US daylight saving or 5:15am HKT during non-US daylight saving) or on Hong Kong public holidays, the rate provided will have a wider bid/ask difference.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">

            <h4 id="1264390361__tab0" class="dropdown-text">When are real-time rates available for Global Money Transfers?  </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1264390361__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_338">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_338" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_331" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Real-time rates are available from Monday at 09:30 until Saturday at 05:00 Hong Kong Time, excluding bank holidays. Exchange rates are subject to a higher bank spread during market closure.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>

        <section id="-336506959__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_339">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_339" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_332" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC real-time exchange rates are refreshed every 60 seconds. You'll be asked to confirm payment details including the exchange rate prior to proceeding with completing the transfer.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll be prompted with a message in a blue banner if the exchange rate has refreshed. Make sure you check the exchange rate before completing the transfer.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_340">

        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_340" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_333" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Real-time exchange rates are not available for the following currencies:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>BDT - Bangladeshi Taka</li> 
 <li>BND - Brunei Dollar</li> 
 <li>EGP - Egyptian Pound</li> 
 <li>JOD - Jordanian Dinar</li> 
 <li>KRW - Korean Won</li> 
 <li>MOP - Macau Pataca</li> 
 <li>MAD - Moroccan Dirham</li> 
 <li>MMK - Burmese Kyat</li> 
 <li>OMR - Omani Rial</li> 
 <li>QAR - Qatari Riyal</li> 
 <li>VND - Vietnamese Dong</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The final debit amount and exchange rate will be decided after you confirm the payment.</p>
</div></div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1096041993__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_341">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_341" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_334" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Fees and charges may differ depending on the payment details (such as destination country/region, transaction currency and amount etc), please visit <a href="/fees/" target="_self">https://www.hsbc.com.hk/fees/</a> and download the Bank Tariff guide to see current Fees & Charges under section C2 for details.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can view all information related to fees during the payment process and before completing the transfer.</p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Note: Some banks may charge a fee for international transfers. Payees will need to check with their banks on what these charges are. The charges will be debited from the payee's account. We're unable to advise on the fees that other banks may charge for payments sent through Global Money Transfers.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can check the information box at the end of your screen or before you confirm your payment to double check the charges required.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Depending on your payment details (such as destination country/region, transaction currency and amount etc), we will determine the suitable path for you, without bothering which rail to pick.             <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_336" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Depending on the country/territory you are sending to, you'll need one or more of the following details:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Bank code/sort code / local clearing code</li>
 <li>SWIFT code / BIC (Bank Identifier Code)</li>
 <li>IBAN (International Bank Account Number)</li>
 <li>Account number</li>
 <li>Payee account type</li>
 <li>Payee full name</li>
 <li>Payee address (optional in some cases)</li>
 <li>Purpose of payment</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The usual way to obtain the bank details is to contact the payee directly and request the details from them.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Send money via SWIFT in currencies including:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Australian Dollar (AUD)</li> 
 <li>Canadian Dollar (CAD)</li> 
 <li>Swiss Franc (CHF)</li> 
 <li>Renminbi (RMB)</li>

 <li>Pound Sterling (GBP)</li>

 <li>Thai Baht (THB)</li> 
 <li>United States Dollar (USD)</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">and others.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If your desired currency is not listed on HSBC HK Mobile Banking App, please proceed to HSBC Online Banking.</p>

    <ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>On your HSBC HK App, go to ‘Pay & Transfer’ and select 'Other global transfers'.</li>
 <li>Select who you want to send to, the country/region, payee account type and enter the amount.</li>
 <li>Select the 'Account to' and "Send from'.</li>
 <li>You'll also have to input your payee's account details such as their name, bank code (mostly in local clearing code format), account number and address (optional in some cases).</li>
</ol>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/transfer-payments/2023-Jan-GDLV-country-list.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">selected countries and currencies</span><span class="visuallyhidden">selected countries and currencies  This link will open in a new window</span></a>, you'll be eligible for faster global payments in a ‘Send like a local’ experience, while for other destinations outside our selected network, we will still route you through the telegraphic transfer via SWIFT network.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_341" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Global Money Transfers usually take around 1-2 business day. Depending on your payment details (such as destination country/region, transaction currency and amount etc), the payment may arrive faster.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can check the estimated time for the transaction to be completed on the review screen, before you complete the payment. Once you've completed the payment, you can view this information again on the confirmation screen.</p>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Mobile cash withdrawal
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_34" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_343" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1604446103__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1604446103__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is Mobile Cash Withdrawal?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1604446103__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_351">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_351" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_344" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Mobile Cash Withdrawal lets you enter your cash withdrawal instructions in just a few steps on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. You can then scan a QR code generated on any local HSBC or Hang Seng ATM. You can also get cash from any non-HSBC Group ATM in Hong Kong and mainland China that supports UnionPay QR Code Withdrawal service. The use of Mobile Cash Withdrawal is subject to relevant terms and conditions.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_344" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1756943989__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1756943989__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I use Mobile Cash Withdrawal?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1756943989__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_352">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_352" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_345" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've downloaded the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app and you've activated your Mobile Security Key on it, you can use Mobile Cash Withdrawal with any of the following HSBC accounts you hold:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>HSBC Integrated account</li> 
 <li>HKD Current account</li> 
 <li>HKD Savings account</li> 
 <li>HKD Statement Savings account</li> 
 <li>Cash Card account</li> 
 <li>Super Ease account</li> 
 <li>University Student account</li> 
 <li>Revolving credit facility</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To make withdrawals from non-HSBC Group ATMs in Hong Kong and mainland China that support the UnionPay QR Code Withdrawal service, you must hold an HSBC UnionPay ATM card.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_345" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="123264214__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="123264214__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Is there a daily withdrawal limit for Mobile Cash Withdrawal? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="123264214__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_353">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_353" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_346" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>At HSBC Group ATMs in Hong Kong</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The most you can withdraw daily at an HSBC or Hang Seng ATM in Hong Kong is HKD10,000, which is the small-value payment limit. The small-value payment limit is capped at this amount but you can set a lower limit if you wish.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you need to withdraw more than HKD10,000 or use other services that are subject to your small-value payment limit, please use your HSBC card at the ATM or visit any of our branches. You can withdraw up to HKD80,000 per day, per card.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>At non-HSBC Group ATMs in Hong Kong and mainland China</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can make withdrawals at a non-HSBC Group ATM in Hong Kong or mainland China that supports the UnionPay QR Code Withdrawal service. You can withdraw up to HKD80,000 per day, or up to the daily withdrawal limit on your UnionPay ATM card. This amount is subject to the operating bank's ATM withdrawal limit.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The daily withdrawal limit on your UnionPay ATM card applies to both withdrawals made with your physical card and through Mobile Cash Withdrawal transactions via the UnionPay network. You can set a limit lower than HKD80,000 if you wish.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="150979850__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_354">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_347" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can make a Mobile Cash Withdrawal by following these steps.</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select 'Mobile Cash Withdrawal' directly from the bottom of your HSBC HK App. Or after logging on, then go to 'Pay & Transfer'. You can also stay on 'Home' and scroll down to 'Explore products and services', then select 'Mobile Cash Withdrawal'.</li> 
 <li>Choose the ATM you want to withdraw from, and if prompted, the location of the ATM.</li> 
 <li>Choose the account you want to withdraw from, enter the amount and select 'Continue'.</li> 
 <li>Press the 'Mobile Cash Withdrawal' button or the 'UnionPay QR Withdrawal' button on the ATM to generate a QR code.</li> 
 <li>Scan the QR code on the ATM screen.</li> 
 <li>Follow the steps on the ATM screen to collect your cash at the ATM.</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

            <span class="chevron"></span>

        <section id="-1435668620__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_355">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_348" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>At HSBC Group ATMs in Hong Kong</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can make a Mobile Cash Withdrawal up to your small-value payment limit, which is capped at HKD10,000 and shared by other small-value transfers such as FPS and non-registered payee transfers.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To adjust your small-value payment limit, log on to the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app and follow these steps:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Stay on 'Home' and select your HSBC HK Mobile Banking profile in the top right corner of the screen.</li> 
 <li>Choose 'Pay and transfer'.</li> 
 <li>Select 'Small-value payment limit' and adjust it.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>At non-HSBC Group ATMs in Hong Kong and mainland China</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have a UnionPay ATM card, you can adjust the daily local or overseas withdrawal limit on your card. This is capped at HKD80,000 but you can set a lower limit.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can set up or amend your daily local withdrawal limit via an ATM.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can set up or amend your daily overseas withdrawal limit on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Log on and follow these steps:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Stay on 'Home' and select your HSBC HK Mobile Banking profile in the top right corner of the screen.</li> 
 <li>Choose 'Pay and transfer'.</li> 
 <li>Select 'Overseas ATM withdrawal limit'.</li> 
 <li>Choose the HSBC UnionPay ATM card you want to set the limit for and adjust it.</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can also use this service at any non-HSBC Group ATMs, in Hong Kong and mainland China that supports the UnionPay QR Code Withdrawal service.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can refer to the UnionPay International website to see which banks support withdrawals through the UnionPay QR Code Withdrawal service.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're an HSBC customer, you won't be charged a fee if you use Mobile Cash Withdrawal at an HSBC or Hang Seng ATM, or at a multi-function machine (MFM).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">But if you use Mobile Cash Withdrawal at a non-HSBC Group ATM that supports the UnionPay QR Code Withdrawal service, withdrawal charges will apply. The operating bank of the ATM may also impose additional fees and charges for such withdrawals.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're not an HSBC customer, such withdrawals will be processed via the UnionPay network. Please check with your bank for any service charges that may apply.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can use Mobile Cash Withdrawal at a non-HSBC Group ATM in mainland China that supports the UnionPay QR Code Withdrawal service through the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can withdraw RMB from your HKD account linked to your HSBC UnionPay ATM card. Please activate your overseas ATM withdrawal limit before you travel to mainland China.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Simply select 'Non-HSBC Group ATM in Hong Kong/China', and select 'Mainland China' as your region.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Kindly note that overseas withdrawal charges will apply. There may be additional fees and charges imposed by the operating bank of the ATM for withdrawals made via the UnionPay network.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can deposit your cheques via the app by following these steps:</p>

 <li>Select 'Confirm' to submit your transaction.</li>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you deposit a cheque via the app before the 5:30pm cut-off time, it will be processed on the same day and the funds will be available after 3:00pm the following business day if it is cleared* successfully.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you deposit a cheque after 5:30pm or on a non-business day (i.e. Saturday, Sunday and public holidays), it will be cleared* within 2 business days.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">* If Typhoon Signal No. 8 or above and/or Black Rainstorm Warning is issued by the Hong Kong Observatory, or an “Extreme Conditions“ is announced by the HKSAR Government, cheque processing and clearing arrangement may be different. Please refer to the following FAQ for details.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If severe weather conditions are in effect <strong>before 9:00am and cancelled after 12:00pm</strong> on a business day (ie Monday to Friday except public holidays), only those cheques deposited before the cut-off time on the previous business day will be processed and cleared (the funds will become available balance after 3:00pm upon successful clearance). All other cheques deposited will be processed on the next business day (if not affected by severe weather conditions).</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If severe weather conditions are in effect <strong>after 9:00am or cancelled before/ at 12:00pm</strong> on a business day, cheque will be processed and cleared as usual.</p>
</div></div>

        <section id="-495036772__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_375">

        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_375" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_368" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A cheque deposit via the app will be rejected based on any of these reasons:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>The cheque is not issued by HSBC or Hang Seng Bank</li>
 <li>The name on the cheque and the selected deposit account don't match</li>
 <li>The cheque is not in HKD</li>
 <li>The input amount via the app and the amount on the cheque don't match</li>
 <li>The quality of cheque image is poor </li>
 <li>The same cheque has already been deposited</li>
 <li>The cheque does not contain cheque verification number (an identification number printed on the left at the front of the cheque)</li>
 <li>Other reasons we consider appropriate to reject the cheque deposit</li>
</ul>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Cheque verification number is an identification number printed on the left at the front of the cheque. The following types of cheques might not have cheque verification number:<br></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">

            <h3 id="-110280220__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Do I need to retain my cheque after I have submitted my mobile cheque deposit?  </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-110280220__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_377">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_377" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_370" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, please retain your original cheque for 180 days after scanning and sending the cheque images via the app. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If your cheque deposit was not cleared or was rejected and you no longer have the original cheque, please contact the cheque issuer for a replacement. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>

</div>

    <div class="anchor" id="anti-scam-alert"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Anti-Scam Alert
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_36" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_370" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="368322680__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="368322680__tab0" class="dropdown-text">When I transfer to my local payee using his/her FPS Proxy ID / account number, there is a reminder displayed saying that the payee account is related to a scam report. What does it mean? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="368322680__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_378">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_378" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_371" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This is an anti-scam alert message and will be shown when the payee's FPS Proxy ID (mobile number / email / FPS identifier) / account number is listed as “High Risk” as per the scam prevention advice provided by the Hong Kong Police Force on Scameter. You are advised to verify the identity of the payee before making transactions. The anti-scam alert is generated based on information collected from scam reports and recorded in the Scameter of the Hong Kong Police Force. Please visit the webpage of Scameter (<a href="https://cyberdefender.hk/en-us/scameter/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">https://cyberdefender.hk/en-us/scameter/</span><span class="visuallyhidden">https://cyberdefender.hk/en-us/scameter/  This link will open in a new window</span></a>) for more details.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_371" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1768699172__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1768699172__tab0" class="dropdown-text">When I see a reminder displayed saying that payee account is related to a scam report, how can I cancel the transfer instruction? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1768699172__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_379">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_379" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_372" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can cancel the transfer instruction by the steps below:</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>HSBC HK App:<br> a. select 'X' at the top of the page; or<br> b. select '...' at the top of the page and then 'Cancel this transfer'; or<br> c. select ‘Cancel transfer’ at the pop up window before confirming the payment</li>
 <li>HSBC Online Banking: select 'Cancel' in the bottom of the page</li>
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_372" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1108428035__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1108428035__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is the source of the anti-scam alert and how is my private information being protected? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1108428035__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_380">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_380" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_373" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The anti-scam alert is generated based on information collected from scam reports and recorded in the Scameter of the Hong Kong Police Force. Please visit the webpage of Scameter (<a href="https://cyberdefender.hk/en-us/scameter/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">https://cyberdefender.hk/en-us/scameter/</span><span class="visuallyhidden">https://cyberdefender.hk/en-us/scameter/  This link will open in a new window</span></a>) for more details.</p>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1314309522__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1314309522__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I confirm and accept the anti-scam alert message and make fund transfer to the FPS proxy ID / account number on the anti-scam alert? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1314309522__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_381">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_381" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_374" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can, but please be reminded that the transaction has high risk of fraud. You are advised to always verify the payment details (including the payee’s identity) of every single transaction before making payment.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
