            <h3 id="1213807276__tab0" class="dropdown-text">If I confirm to the bank to proceed with a transfer with FPS proxy ID (i.e. mobile number / email address / FPS Identifier) / account number flagged as “High Risk” and subsequently realize being scammed, what should I do? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1213807276__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_382">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_382" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_375" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you suspect you have been scammed, you may visit a police station or the Hong Kong Police Force e-Report Centre (<a href="https://www.police.gov.hk/ppp_en" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">https://www.police.gov.hk/ppp_en</span><span class="visuallyhidden">https://www.police.gov.hk/ppp_en  This link will open in a new window</span></a> or <a href="https://www.police.gov.hk/ppp_tc" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">https://www.police.gov.hk/ppp_tc</span><span class="visuallyhidden">https://www.police.gov.hk/ppp_tc  This link will open in a new window</span></a>) to file a report. In tandem, please report the case to us.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_375" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1662752898__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1662752898__tab0" class="dropdown-text">If there is no anti-scam alert message relating to my local payee, does it guarantee it is safe to transfer to him / her? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1662752898__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_383">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_383" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_376" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No, it is not guaranteed. The anti-scam alert message will only be shown if the payee’s FPS proxy ID / account number is included in the scam reports provided by the Hong Kong Police Force from time to time. If there has not been any report to the Police against a particular FPS proxy ID / account number at the relevant time, the proxy ID / account number will not trigger an anti-scam alert.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You are advised to always verify the payment details (including the payee’s identity) of every single transaction before making payment.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

            <h3 id="-1580932935__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How would I know if my payee’s mobile number / email address / FPS Identifier / account number is flagged for anti-scam alert? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1580932935__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_384">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_377" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can check Scameter (<a href="https://cyberdefender.hk/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">cyberdefender.hk</span><span class="visuallyhidden">cyberdefender.hk  This link will open in a new window</span></a>) to see if it is flagged as “High Risk”. When performing fund transfer with use of FPS proxy ID (i.e. mobile number, email address, or FPS Identifier) / account number via internet banking or mobile banking app, we will display an anti-scam alert message for those FPS proxy IDs / account number flagged in the scam reports provided by the Hong Kong Police Force. You are advised not to make any transactions to the payee unless you have carefully verified the payee’s identity and ensure that the payee is trustworthy.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">FPS proxy IDs and account number are flagged as "High Risk" in Scameter and triggered the anti-scam alert are based on information collected from scam reports provided by the Hong Kong Police Force. If there has not been any report to the Police against a particular FPS proxy ID / account number, it will not trigger the anti-scam alert.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The anti-scam alert is generated based on information collected from scam reports provided by the Hong Kong Police Force and updated from time to time on a daily basis. Please check again that the payee is trustworthy before you proceed with the transaction.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The push notifications are sent by The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited at 1 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can opt in or out of receiving push notifications at any time by changing your communication preferences on the HSBC HK app.</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Log on to the app.</li> 
 <li>Select your profile icon on the top right corner of the 'Home' page.</li> 
 <li>Find 'Settings and preferences' and select 'Communication preferences'.</li> 
 <li>Choose 'Push notification preferences'.</li> 
 <li>Switch on/off 'Transactions & Services' and/or 'Personalised offers'.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can also go to 'Push notification preferences' through your message history. Simply click on the 3 dots next to an existing message, then select 'Change my preference', and you'd be brought to 'Push notification preferences' page where you can switch on/off 'Transactions & Services' and/or 'Personalised offers'.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For enquires, please call us on</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>HSBC Global Private Banking customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li> 
 <li>HSBC Premier Elite customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li> 
 <li>HSBC Premier customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3322" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3322</a></li> 
 <li>Other customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3000" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3000</a></li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_405">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_397" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Critical alerts:</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If there's something important that needs your attention, we'll let you know via push notification if you've enabled push notifications on your device. Critical alerts include fraud, payment authorisation and identity verification alerts.<br> <br> 'Chat with us' responses:</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When the push notification function on your device has been enabled, we will also send you push notifications of ‘Chat with us’ responses.<br> <br> Transactions & Services:</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Stay up to date with your account and other HSBC services. These notifications include transaction alerts, payment reminders, eStatements, eAdvices and other service updates.  </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When completing a high risk transaction, we'll notify you through two communication channels. If you have these notifications turned on, you'll receive a push notification or SMS, in addition to an email alert.<br> <br> Personalised offers:</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have these notifications turned on, you'll hear about promotional offers on our products and services that are relevant to you.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This preference only applies to push notifications and doesn't opt you in or out of any other marketing channels. Find out how we use your data in our <a href="/misc/data-privacy-notice/" target="_self">Data Privacy Notice</a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Examples of transactions include FPS Inward Transfer, Credit Card Repayment, Self name Transfer to Joint Account, and more.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">From February 2025 onwards, you'll also receive a push notification in addition to an email alert for the high risk transaction - Credit limit increase request submitted/approved.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">More notifications will be made available via push notification.</p>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_407">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_399" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">‘Transactions & Services’ push notifications help you stay up to date with your account and other HSBC services. These notifications include transaction alerts, payment reminders, eStatements, eAdvices and other service updates. When completing a high risk transaction, we'll notify you through two communication channels. If you have these notifications turned on, you’ll receive a push notification or SMS, in addition to an email alert.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have ‘Personalised offers’ push notifications turned on, you'll hear about promotional offers on our products and services that are relevant to you, including promotions, special offers and campaign details.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_408">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_400" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There might be a couple of reasons for this.</p>
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL">
 <li>You might have disabled notifications in your device settings, or on the HSBC HK app. To allow notifications from the app, log on, then click the bell icon in the top right corner of the homepage. Tap the banner that takes you to device settings, then you need to follow the link and enable notifications.</li>
 <li>There might occasionally be delays or delivery failures for notifications. This could be due to network connectivity issues or the data settings on your device.</li>
 <li>If you're on an Android device, Google services may be limited in some countries and territories, so your device may not be able to receive push notifications in those areas.</li>
</ol>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll still find your notifications received within the last 90 days in push notifications history.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll also receive an SMS and email with relevant high risk transaction details if push notifications couldn't be sent successfully.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your preference will apply to all accounts and services with the bank except PayMe, insurance, pension and MPF.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Here's the latest list of documents that comprise important notifications: </p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Terms and conditions related documents:<br> - Notices of changes<br> - Key changes, summary and full versions of existing/ revised terms and conditions</li>
 <li>Key facts statements of banking and investment services</li>
 <li>Notice of changes in fees and charges</li>
 <li>Confirmation letter for loans</li>
 <li>Notification on account status change</li>
 <li>Notification on account closure</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Some notifications are not feasible to be sent through electronic channels. If this is the case, you may still receive them by post.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We will periodically review and update the above list.<br> <br> Please note that if you choose to apply for a product or service by completing a digital form or by using a digital channel, any terms and conditions and other important notification provided at the time of application will only be provided in non-paper based format.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In-app authentication allows customers to perform authentication through the HSBC HK App. This new authentication method is applicable for phone banking and 'Chat with us'. Eligible customers will receive an authentication request via HSBC HK App.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You don't need to set anything up. Just make sure you have updated your HSBC HK App to the latest version and follow the steps below to complete the authentication:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Launch the HSBC HK App or tap on the push notification of in-app authentication request</li>
 <li>Enter your 6-digit Mobile Banking PIN or verify your identity using biometric authentication</li>
 <li>Review the in-app authentication request</li>
 <li>Approve the request if all the information is correct</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Note: Enable push notification on the HSBC HK App to be alerted with any in-app authentication request: Log on > Profile icon > 'Communication preferences'.</p>
</div></div>

        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_44" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_429" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-221820392__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-221820392__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is Interbank Account Data Sharing (IADS)? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-221820392__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_438">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_438" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_430" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>The Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) Interbank Account Data Sharing (IADS) initiative allows the sharing of your deposit account data, with your consent, between the participating banks via the use of Open API.</p>
<p>After granting the necessary consent, you can view your account details from your other banks within the HSBC HK App. As a result, you can save time on checking the balance of your numerous bank accounts.</p>
<p>Alternatively, you can also share your HSBC account data to Third-party Service Providers.</p>
<p>To learn more about IADS, please visit here <a href="https://www.hkma.gov.hk/eng/key-functions/international-financial-centre/fintech/interbank-account-data-sharing/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">HKMA IADS Web Page</span><span class="visuallyhidden">HKMA IADS Web Page  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_430" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="647277884__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="647277884__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Do I have to register to use Open Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="647277884__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_439">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_439" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_431" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>There is no need to register. This service is free of charge.</p>
<p>You can simply grant consent to HSBC to access your other banks' account data and you can see a consolidated view of your balances from other banks.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_431" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="2015076504__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="2015076504__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How do I grant consent for HSBC to access my other banks' account data? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2015076504__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_440">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_440" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_432" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>You can grant your consent by selecting 'Add accounts' via one of the below options on the HSBC HK App:</p>
<div class="commonMark-list">
<ol>
<li>Homepage > 'Accounts with other banks' section; or</li>
<li>'Profile' > 'Open Banking consent' > 'Data from other banks' (Consent Dashboard).</li>
</ol>
</div>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_432" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1413482914__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1413482914__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How do I view my other banks' account balances? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1413482914__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_441">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_441" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_433" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can access this data via 'Accounts with other banks' section on the homepage.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_433" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1605258052__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1605258052__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How do I manage the consents to / from other banks? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1605258052__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_442">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_442" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_434" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>You can refer to the list of consents you've successfully granted to us or to your other banks by going to HSBC HK App > 'Profile' > 'Open Banking consent' > 'Data from other banks' or 'Data to other banks'.</p>
<p>You can manage your consent by adding new consents or cancelling existing ones.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_434" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="915764724__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="915764724__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How to use Open Banking safely? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="915764724__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_443">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_443" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_435" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p>With Open Banking, HSBC can share real-time data on HSBC services with our partners. Check and see if the app you want to use is on our existing <a href="https://developer.hsbc.com.hk/#/partnership" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">partnership list</span><span class="visuallyhidden">partnership list  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p>You can also share your HSBC data with the other banks participating in the HKMA IADS initiative. To learn more about the HKMA IADS initiative and the participating banks, you may visit the <a href="https://www.hkma.gov.hk/eng/key-functions/international-financial-centre/fintech/interbank-account-data-sharing/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">HKMA IADS Web Page</span><span class="visuallyhidden">HKMA IADS Web Page  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p>However, be careful even when dealing with trusted apps. When you're using them for banking functions, it's not the same as interacting directly with the bank. If you choose to use a third-party app, be aware of what type of permissions the app asks for.</p>
<p>If you must disclose your banking details to a third-party app, make sure you first understand the scope of consent you're giving and the associated risks (such as fraud or data leakage). Carefully consider whether you trust the app or service because you would bear the risk if something goes wrong. To know more tips on how to keep your information safe, <a href="/help/cybersecurity-and-fraud/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">check out our Cybersecurity page</span><span class="visuallyhidden">check out our Cybersecurity page  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p>You may also refer to the following video from the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (Chinese version only) on how to identify Trusted Third-party Service Provider. <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=igHxqJGRXLI" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">Watch video now</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Watch video now  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    

</div>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
